duties_responsibilities.duty: Advocate Problem Solving & Continuous Improvement initiatives.
Assess & convey KPI performance in line with business objectives.
Support organizational pillars (FMOS, AM, FI, PM, Safety, Quality).
Integrate new processes, products, packaging identifying areas for process optimization.
Coach in Root Cause Analysis & Problem Solving.
Achieve $200k/year or higher in Continuous Improvement savings.

education_certification.credential: B.S. Degree in Food Safety, Engineering, or other related fields.
Lean Six Sigma Green Belt certification
